nrqlQueries.query: SELECT ((average(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes) * cardinality(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes)) - (average(kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes) * cardinality(kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes))) FROM Metric WHERE (((job = 'kubelet') AND (metrics_path = '/metrics'))) SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET dimensions(exclude: {'node', 'instance'}) LIMIT max TIMESERIES 30000

SELECT (average(kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes) * cardinality(kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes)) FROM Metric WHERE (((job = 'kubelet') AND (metrics_path = '/metrics'))) SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET dimensions(exclude: {'node', 'instance'}) LIMIT max TIMESERIES 30000

SELECT max((((`__result_0` - `__result_1`) / `__result_2`) * 100)) FROM (SELECT latest(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes) AS `__result_0`, latest(kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes) AS `__result_1`, latest(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes) AS `__result_2` FROM Metric WHERE (((job = 'kubelet') AND (metrics_path = '/metrics')) AND ((persistentvolmeclaim = '') OR persistentvolmeclaim IS NULL)) FACET dimensions() LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000) SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET dimensions(exclude: {'node', 'instance'}) LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000

SELECT (average(kubelet_volume_stats_inodes_used) * cardinality(kubelet_volume_stats_inodes_used)) FROM Metric WHERE (((job = 'kubelet') AND (metrics_path = '/metrics'))) SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET dimensions(exclude: {'node', 'instance'}) LIMIT max TIMESERIES 30000

SELECT max(((`__result_0` / `__result_1`) * 100)) FROM (SELECT latest(kubelet_volume_stats_inodes_used) AS `__result_0`, latest(kubelet_volume_stats_inodes) AS `__result_1` FROM Metric WHERE (((job = 'kubelet') AND (metrics_path = '/metrics'))) FACET prometheus_server LIMIT max TIMESERIES 30000) SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET dimensions(exclude: {'node', 'instance'}) LIMIT max TIMESERIES 30000

SELECT max(((`__result_0` / `__result_1`) * 100)) FROM (SELECT latest(kubelet_volume_stats_inodes_used) AS `__result_0`, latest(kubelet_volume_stats_inodes) AS `__result_1` FROM Metric WHERE (((job = 'kubelet') AND (metrics_path = '/metrics'))) FACET prometheus_server LIMIT max TIMESERIES 30000) SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET dimensions(exclude: {'node', 'instance'}) LIMIT max TIMESERIES 30000
